card.description: Data collected from 'African Safari Tours', a company that offers tours of the Serengeti plains in Africa.

context.potentialUses: Can be used to determine the best times to visit the safari to make sure you see the most amount of wildlife.
context.potentialMisuses: Only certain types of animals are tracked, so avoid jumping to conclusions on animals that are not a part of this set (like zebras or hippopotamus).

lions.description: Number of lions seen during a visit.

people.description: Amount of total people on safari during a visit.

dayOfMonth.description: The day of the month (1-31) of a visit.

ticketRevenue.description: The profit of the safari company on the day of a visit.

antelope.description: Number of antelope seen during a visit.

rhino.description: Number of rhinos seen during a visit.

elephant.description: Number of elephants seen during a visit.

alligator.description: Number of alligators seen during a visit.

trees.description: Number of overgrowth and trees providing shade seen during the visit.

mosquitos.description: Number of mosquitos seen during the visit.

overgrowthPercent.description: Percent of the land that has grass and bushes and shrubbery during a visit.
